project.name: House of Operation Management Landing Page
project.description: Professional landing page website for real estate operations outsourcing company

tasks.title: Project Setup and Structure
tasks.description: Initialize project structure with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files
tasks.details: Created index.html, styles.css, and script.js files with proper structure

tasks.title: HTML Structure Implementation
tasks.description: Create semantic HTML5 markup for all website sections
tasks.details: Implemented navigation, hero, mission/vision, services, SWOT, contact, and footer sections

tasks.title: CSS Styling and Design
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive CSS styling with modern design principles
tasks.details: Created professional styling with blue color scheme, responsive design, and hover effects

tasks.title: JavaScript Functionality
tasks.description: Add interactive functionality including smooth scrolling and form validation
tasks.details: Implemented smooth scrolling, form validation, animations, and mobile menu functionality

tasks.title: Logo Integration
tasks.description: Integrate company logo (image.png) throughout the website
tasks.details: Logo integrated in navigation, hero section, and footer

tasks.title: Content Integration
tasks.description: Add all company information including mission, vision, services, and SWOT analysis
tasks.details: All content from user requirements properly integrated with proper formatting

tasks.title: GitHub Repository Creation
tasks.description: Create GitHub repository and upload website files
tasks.details: Created GitHub repository at https://github.com/mohamedbakerysoft/HouseOfOperation and uploaded all website files including README.md

tasks.title: Responsive Design Testing
tasks.description: Test and ensure website works properly on all device sizes
tasks.details: Test mobile, tablet, and desktop responsiveness

tasks.title: Cross-Browser Testing
tasks.description: Test website functionality across different browsers
tasks.details: Test Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge compatibility

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize website performance for faster loading times
tasks.details: Optimize images, minify CSS/JS, and implement performance best practices

tasks.title: SEO Optimization
tasks.description: Implement SEO best practices for better search engine visibility
tasks.details: Add meta tags, improve semantic markup, and optimize content structure

tasks.title: Contact Form Backend Integration
tasks.description: Set up backend functionality for contact form submissions
tasks.details: Implement server-side form handling and email notifications

tasks.title: Analytics Integration
tasks.description: Add Google Analytics or similar tracking solution
tasks.details: Track user engagement and website performance metrics

tasks.title: Accessibility Testing
tasks.description: Ensure website meets accessibility standards (WCAG)
tasks.details: Test screen reader compatibility and keyboard navigation

tasks.title: Content Management Documentation
tasks.description: Create documentation for easy content updates
tasks.details: Document how to update content, add new sections, and maintain the website

tasks.title: Final Review and Launch Preparation
tasks.description: Comprehensive review and preparation for website launch
tasks.details: Final testing, bug fixes, and launch checklist completion

tasks.title: Domain Registration
tasks.description: Register houseoperation.com domain name
tasks.details: Domain houseoperation.com successfully registered and reserved by user

tasks.title: Deployment Script Creation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive deployment script for server setup
tasks.details: Created deploy.sh script with nginx setup, SSL configuration, firewall setup, and automatic website deployment. Script uploaded to GitHub repository.

tasks.title: DNS Configuration
tasks.description: Configure DNS A records to point domain to server IP
tasks.details: Need to set A records: houseoperation.com → 165.232.79.201 and www.houseoperation.com → 165.232.79.201

tasks.title: Server Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy website to production server with SSL
tasks.details: Run deployment script on server (165.232.79.201) to install nginx, configure SSL, and deploy website files. Instructions provided in DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md

tasks.title: SSL Certificate Installation
tasks.description: Install and configure Let's Encrypt SSL certificate
tasks.details: Automatic SSL certificate installation via Let's Encrypt with auto-renewal setup (included in deployment script)

tasks.title: Production Website Testing
tasks.description: Test live website functionality and SSL configuration
tasks.details: Test https://houseoperation.com, verify SSL certificate, check all website functionality, and test contact form on production server

tasks.title: CEO Spotlight Section Implementation
tasks.description: Add CEO Huda Mahdy profile section as the first section of the website
tasks.details: Created comprehensive CEO spotlight section featuring Huda Mahdy with professional photo, executive summary highlighting 10+ years of real estate operations experience, MENA region expertise, and strategic business development background. Implemented responsive design with professional styling and positioned as the first section after navigation.

tasks.title: Website Modernization & CEO Section Enhancement
tasks.description: Modernize website design with enhanced CEO section featuring larger image and summarized content
tasks.details: Modernized CEO section with: large professional photo (500px max-width) with hover effects and overlay, gradient background with backdrop blur effects, summarized executive content for better readability, modern credential badges with glass morphism styling, prominent CEO title highlighting 'Huda Mahdy - CEO of House of Operation Management' under photo, improved responsive design for mobile devices, updated CEO image to latest professional photo (ceo.png)

tasks.title: Enhanced Hero Section & Deployment Optimization
tasks.description: Redesign hero section with large centered image and text below, optimize deployment script
tasks.details: Enhanced hero section: enlarged logo from 500px to 700px max-width (450px mobile) with hover effects and drop shadows, repositioned text content below image for better visual hierarchy, improved responsive design for mobile devices. Optimized deployment script to pull changes directly into website directory (/var/www/houseoperation.com) instead of copying files, eliminating intermediate steps and ensuring all repository files are properly deployed. Fixed Git ownership issues and merge conflicts in deployment script with safe.directory configuration, proper chown commands, git stash for local changes, and hard reset before pulling. Fine-tuned CEO image size: 600px max-width with 400px minimum height for perfect balance, 85% width on mobile, 1.8fr grid column allocation, 3:4 aspect ratio. Removed separate title section and integrated CEO caption directly on image with always-visible overlay: enhanced text styling (2.5rem name, 1.2rem position in gold), improved shadow effects, responsive mobile sizing (2rem/1rem).
